name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn Off YouTube Comments & Live Chat

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn off YouTube comments and hide YouTube live chat on videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide YouTube comments and/or live chat.

To hide comments while being able to add comments, uncheck "Hide Add Comment Box" and check "Hide Comments".

Compatible with mobile YouTube, m.youtube.com.

For more features including removing recommendations, comments, and more: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/unhook-remove-youtube-rec/khncfooichmfjbepaaaebmommgaepoid

Turn Off YouTube Comments & Live Chat is also available on:
- Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/youtube-comments-live-chat/
- Microsoft Edge: https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/turn-off-youtube-comments/adfcjmeholkejegahoglmldgneejfpkg
